As a parent, it can be heartbreaking to see our children suffer like this. Have you considered seeking professional help for her? Sometimes, a little extra support and guidance can go a long way in helping children overcome their fears and insecurities. And remember, it's okay to take care of yourself too - it's important to prioritize your own well-being so that you can be the best support system for your daughter during this challenging time."
